SELECT PRODUCT_NO ,CATEGORY_NO ,PRODUCT_NAME ,PRODUCT_PRICE ,FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME TITLEIMG FROM PRODUCTS P JOIN CATEGORY C USING (CATEGORY_NO) JOIN PRODUCTS_ATTACHMENT PA USING (PRODUCT_NO) WHERE FILE_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY P.CREATE_DATE DESC
UPDATE PRODUCTS SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE PRODUCT_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM PRODUCTS WHERE PRODUCT_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT FILE_NO ,ORIGIN_NAME ,CHANGE_NAME ,FILE_PATH FROM PRODUCTS_ATTACHMENT WHERE PRODUCT_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE PRODUCTS SET PRODUCT_NAME = ? ,CATEGORY_NO = ? ,PRODUCT_PRICE = ? ,PRODUCT_INFO = ? ,PRODUCT_INGREDIENT = ? ,PRODUCT_BRAND = ? WHERE PRODUCT_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE PRODUCTS_ATTACHMENT SET ORIGIN_NAME = ? ,CHANGE_NAME = ? ,FILE_PATH = ? ,FILE_LEVEL = ? WHERE FILE_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
